attributes.action: to consider his actions in not calling an election for Nov 2007 and submit his resignation to HM The Queen as he has no mandate from the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is raised in the hope that Gordon Brown will actually follow through on his promise to be a PM for the country and not just for Labour by taking the responsible and justifed decision to call a General Election. Tony Blair said he would remain PM for a full term in 2005.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
